data.name: MiLE HiGH TAXi Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo will give you access to 1 of the 3 protagonist taxi drivers, and has a 5 minute game play time limit (plus intro, tutorial, etc).
data.about_the_game: This demo will give you access to 1 of the 3 protagonist taxi drivers, and has a 5 minute game play time limit (plus intro, tutorial, etc).
data.short_description: "The Fifth Element" meets "Crazy Taxi" in this sci-fi race against time.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Please tell me you can get a multipass”
nexus6ca

“That face when an indy developers work has better driving simulation then cyberpunk.”
bravejango
